DOC.brief_summary: The aim study : 1 . To investigate diet influence size composition fat globule breast milk control diet . 2 . To study change globule distribution along one session lactation day . Study design : Subjects : This open label study . Each subject serve control . Study population include 45 volunteer mother , divide 3 group : 15 vegetarian , 15 western diet 15 Bedouins . Each participant nursing 2-5 month baby . Each participant sign inform consent . Each participant ask collect 2 milk sample twice day i.e.- first nursing morning ( begin end nursing session ) , even last nursing , ( begin end ) . Each sample contain 5 ml milk . Participants ask repeat procedure one month later .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers nurse baby age 25 month . Age : 2045 year old . Written informed consent . Nursing baby 5 month le 2 month . Infants consume breast milk replacement formula top breast milk .
